meta_title: Forklift Licence Requirements Australia: The 2026 Compliance Guide
meta_description: The definitive 2026 guide to High Risk Work (HRW) forklift licence requirements in Australia. Covers TLILIC0003, assessment criteria, and fleet compliance with
title: Forklift Licence Requirements Australia: A Definitive Guide to HRW Compliance and Fleet Safety

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Forklift Licence Requirements Australia: A Definitive Guide to HRW Compliance and Fleet Safety

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, clean Australian warehouse facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of warehouse staff (men and women) are conducting a safety briefing; they are wearing high-visibility vests, safety boots, and hard hats. One person is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) gesturing towards a yellow forklift in the mid-ground. The forklift is modern, with a subtle digital sensor visible on the mast. In the background, high pallet racking is neatly stocked. The lighting is bright and industrial, emphasizing safety and technology. No text or words in the image.
